title: (Not Mine) So theres Chosen Master Yi...what about the other Chosen Wuju Practitioneer?

embed.description: I'm sure other people have had this idea. Just thought I'd give my own spin on it. Wukong IS Master Yi's apprentice isn't he? File with my other dumb league of legends fanart. I ...

replies.body:
BOTH SMITE AND LOL GOT THE RELISTIC WUKONG LORE ACCORDING TO LEGENDS SUPER DOOPER ASSHOLICLY WRONG FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUTTTTTTTTT
on the bright side {{champion:432}} is fat

Smite has already made a Dark Side Star Wars skin for their Wukong. I feel like Riot should be cautioned lest they be sued for copying or accused of copying Smite. 
I think it would work though, go for it Riot, make this happen.
this is a bloody snazzy looking skin if i say so myself, riot make this happen!

that is pretty darn beastly, will say.
# #NoPunIntended
